(sigma/r)^6)" bondCutoff="0"> <GlobalParameter name="pot-LJ12_6" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="pot-COULOMB_GAUSSIAN" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-epsilon_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="cr-sigma_Geometric" defaultValue="1"/> <GlobalParameter name="nexcl" defaultValue="2"/> <GlobalParameter name="prefactor-" defaultValue="1"/> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="sigma"/> <PerParticleParameter name="epsilon"/> <PerParticleParameter name="charge"/> <PerParticleParameter name="zeta"/> <Atom type="br_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05" zeta="12"/> <Atom type="cl_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="f_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="0.4" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="hbr_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="hcl_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="hf_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="hi_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065" zeta="13"/> <Atom type="i_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="2.1" zeta="12"/> </CustomNonbondedForce> <NonbondedForce coulomb14scale="1" lj14scale="1"> <UseAttributeFromResidue name="charge"/> <Atom type="br_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05"/> <Atom type="cl_1" sigma="0.375" epsilon="1.05"/> <Atom type="f_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="0.4"/> <Atom type="hbr_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065"/> <Atom type="hcl_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065"/> <Atom type="hf_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065"/> <Atom type="hi_1" sigma="0.005" epsilon="0.065"/> <Atom type="i_1" sigma="0.275" epsilon="2.1"/> </NonbondedForce> </ForceField>
